product_description: Herbae has been conceived to reflect those imperfections that make us unique. That is why Herbae has chosen wild herbs to star in its perfume, characterized by their untamed freedom and blended with lively flowers. In the heart of Provence, the botanical powers of wild herbs seem intensified by the strength of the sun of this region, the natural extract of wild herbs blends with the notes of blackberry, wild rose, and white nettle. Enveloping, eminently green, floral and fresh like nature in its truest form, its bottle is a jewel of freedom with an engraved medallion. A raffia knot on the cap is in itself the metaphor of Herbae: it is natural, unique, each knot is knotted by hand. The green stem of the long, intentionally curved vaporizer perfectly illustrates wild herbs. Herbae is an ode to imperfection!

product_description: A practical soap that will provide you with a moment of escape. This soap generates a light, fine and creamy foam on contact with water. It cleanses and perfumes the body and hands, leaving the fresh, citrus and aquatic trail of Cap Cédrat for Men on the skin. A vibrant citrus cocktail on a turbulent background of woody spices. THE PERFUME Citrusy, aromatic and woody, Cap Cédrat for Men opens on the dynamic and refreshing meeting of citron and icy mint. The composition unfolds on an aquatic, spicy and masculine accord. A deep accord of cedar, amber and musk brings an attenuating, woody note to the fragrance. The perfume is composed around an essential oil of citron which reinforces its freshness and naturalness. THE AUTHENTIC STORY Bright and instinctive, Cap Cédrat for Men is the fragrance of a man with a passion for freedom. He takes to the sea. The unknown awaits him. Determined, he sets sail on a citrus and aquatic voyage to find himself. The Cap Cédrat man has his roots in Arles. It is inspired by the sailors of Arles, proud and free men who have built the history of Provence. THE DESIGN A soap with the deep colors of Cap Cédrat for Men, reproducing a driftwood motif. RECOMMENDATION The fresh accord of Cap Cédrat for Men is declined in a range of shaving and body products. Discover Cap Cédrat Eau de Toilette for Men, citrusy and masculine.
product_name: Jabón Cap Cédrat 50g - L'Occitane en Provence

product_description: This traditional shaving soap prepares your skin and beard for shaving. Juniper Shaving Soap (Cade) is used with a brush. Paired with the L'OCCITANE Shaving Bowl, its "old-fashioned" use makes it the ideal gift.
product_name: Jabón de Afeitado Cade 100g - L'Occitane en Provence

product_description: The skin is perfumed with an opulent and woody fragrance.    THE PERFUME This oriental and spicy fragrance seduces by the diversity of its notes and how they complement each other.    Stimulating, it reveals sometimes spices and sometimes flowers, ending with woody nuances.      Spices at the top, with its pink berries, this natural perfume is then balanced by floral notes of peony, rose and heliotropin. Finally, frankincense and myrrh give it its warm and captivating character. Complete and complex, this fragrance transforms itself to reveal the mystery and charisma of the person who wears it.      THE AUTHENTIC STORY Imagine a city where the scents of the Orient are king: Iparie. Its walls exposed to the hot sun emanate an intense scent of an opulent Orient, which expands into a perfumed offering. These rare and powerful scents, formerly carried by the incense route in the Eastern Mediterranean, merge into a sensual and mysterious trail, the Eau de Toilette de Iparie.      THE COLLECTION & iexcl;Timeless, emblematic, established, classic!    With the Les Classiques de L'Occitane collection, L'Occitane returns to its fragrance heritage and brings back the iconic fragrances of the past.      THE PACKAGE Classic and with refined lines, this packaging is the very reflection of the timelessness of the perfumes that make up this range. The sobriety and transparency that characterize this packaging give value to the fragrance it contains.
product_name: Eau d'Iparie - Eau de Parfum Les Classiques 50ml - L'Occitane en Provence
product_type: Perfume>Perfumes de mujer>Perfumes de ámbar de mujer
short_title: Eau d'Iparie - Les Classiques Eau de Parfum

Three flowers with two faces, between tender innocence and hypnotic sensuality. The contrasting beauties of Provence, at once sweet, bold and impetuous. The "Les Classiques de L'OCCITANE" collection brings together the icons of L'OCCITANE en Provence's perfumery heritage to convey their historic scents.

product_description: Radiant, angelic, sensual, the Jasmine-Evergreen-Neroli fragrance unites innocence and magnetismThe floral and decidedly feminine perfume that gardens give off at dawn, and the warm scent of the evergreen or golden flower, so present in Corsica.Its sparkling top notes offer a current of fresh air. Lemon, Petit Grain and pink berry merge to provoke a deep inspiration that floods the feelings. Its heart fuses notes of Jasmine with Orange Blossom, an intoxicating duo enhanced with Corsican Immortelle, reminiscent of a large bouquet of flowers. A scent that encapsulates the scent of Corsica, the island of beauty, dotted with woody and musky notes. Pierre Hermé, the "Picasso of Pastry", began his career at the age of 14 in the well-known pastry shop Gaston Lenôtre. Ten years later, his name has gone around the world. With pleasure as his guide, he has revolutionized the most stable traditions and invented a universe of flavors, sensations and pleasures. In 1997, he created with Charles Znaty the house Pierre Hermé Paris, joining the ranks of Haute-Reposserie.In 2015, his friend Olivier Baussan invites him to compose a collection of perfumes inspired by his pastry compositions. "I created these perfumes as if they were to be savored".Result: contrasting fragrances, vivid memories of the lands of the Mediterranean island of beauty (Corsica) and the two men who adore it.Result: contrasting fragrances, vivid memories of the lands of the Mediterranean island of beauty (Corsica) and the two men who adore it. To prolong the experience of this fresh and spicy bouquet of Grapefruit and Rhubarb, discover the body care collection that associates everyday gestures with moments of pure pleasure.
product_name: Eau de Toilette Jazmín Siempreviva Neroli 50ml - L'Occitane en Provence
short_title: Eau de Toilette Jasmine Immortelle Neroli

product_description: As part of its responsible approach, L'OCCITANE combines luxury beauty and increasingly environmental care by proposing a refillable bottle. With a simple and quick movement, it refills the Harmonie Divine Serum. L'OCCITANE combines for the first time the power of the land and sea of Corsica through exceptional care: essential oil of Immortelle reserve (Millésimée), the flower that does not wither, meets Jania Rubens, algae with eternal regeneration capacity. The result of a unique formulation, Harmonie Divine Cream reveals an evolutionary formula with a new sensoriality: the nourishing power of a cream, associated with the natural finish of a dry oil. On contact with the skin, the texture of the cream transforms into a soft oil, allowing the formula to melt perfectly into the skin. A youth care solution, Harmonie Divine Cream helps to act on skin texture, wrinkles, radiance and facial volume at the same time. Thanks to its daily use: - The skin immediately reveals a new softness: 90% - After 2 months, marked wrinkles appear smoothed: 71% - After 3 months, the skin texture appears transformed: 87% - After 2 months, the skin reveals a repulped volumes as a younger skin: 83% - After 2 months, the appearance of spots appears reduced: 86% - After 3 months, the skin reveals an exceptional clarity: 85% Satisfaction tests conducted on 31 women / 52 women / 35 women. This oil cream with a subtle and aromatic fragrance immerses you in a moment of unprecedented sensoriality. Serene, the face reveals a visibly better defined oval, balanced and more harmonious contours. Second stage of the Harmonie Divine ritual, this treatment cream is used morning and evening after the application of the Harmonie Divine Serum.
product_name: Ecorrecarga Crema Harmonie Divine 50ml - L'Occitane en Provence

product_description: L'OCCITANE associates for the first time the power of the land and sea of Corsica through an exceptional care: essential oil of Immortelle Reserve (Millésimée), the flower that does not wither, meets Jania Rubens, algae with eternal regeneration capacity. Initiator of the treatment ritual and highly concentrated in Jania Rubens extract, Harmonie Divine Serum helps to take action focused on skin texture and wrinkles, facial contours and volumes. 1.Skin texture and wrinkles The grain seems to refine, the wrinkles of "sadness" (nasolabial wrinkle, frown ...) seem less visible. The contour of the face The skin appears more elastic, as if toned to fight against sagging skin, the oval of the face seems redefined. 3. The volumes of the face The skin seems to repulp immediately; after two months, it appears denser, the cheeks and cheekbones are repulped, the volumes are balanced and harmonious. Satisfaction test on 55 women. Apply the serum in the morning and evening, with a massage on clean and dry skin, on the face and neck. Avoid the eye contour area. The first essential step of the Harmonie Divine ritual, this serum is used before the Harmonie Divine Cream. Our Spa experts have developed a new massage inspired by Shiatsu techniques. This massage focuses on the pressure points of the face in order to help: 1. Prepare the skin to receive the treatment. 2. Optimize the absorption of the care and bring instant comfort to the skin. 3. Relax facial tensions and smooth expression lines and wrinkles. This serum is the alliance of an ultra-fine texture enriched in Jania Rubens that fuses with the oil encapsulated in 500 micro-spheres of seimpreviva, which protect and isolate the molecules to keep them intact. It combines the lightness of a serum texture with the comfort of a silky oil, leaving the skin velvety soft. Its subtle and aromatic fragrance immerses you in an unprecedented moment of sensoriality. After 15 years of research on the immortelle, the flower that never withers, and its proven beauty benefits on the skin, L'OCCITANE enriches its range with an essential oil of immortelle reserve, with exceptional anti-aging properties. Jania Rubens, an eternal regeneration capacity. It is in the heart of the Bay of Revellata, in Corsica, a protected area with warm mineral waters, next to the fields of immortelle, that L'OCCITANE. has discovered the red alga Jania Rubens. Sheltered from the elements and pollution, the Revellata bay benefits from an ideal exposure to the sun's rays, allowing the algae to continuously produce calcite crystals, a resource of its capacity for continuous regeneration. As part of its responsible approach, L'OCCITANE combines luxury beauty and increasingly environmental care by proposing a refillable bottle. With a simple and quick movement, it refills the Harmonie Divine Serum. L'OCCITANE combines for the first time the power of the land and sea of Corsica through exceptional care: essential oil of Immortelle reserve (Millésimée), the flower that does not wither, meets Jania Rubens, algae with eternal regeneration capacity.

product_description: This global anti-aging treatment is enriched with organic Immortelle extract from Corsica, a natural alternative to Retinol. Reformulated, this cream helps fight the 7 visible signs of aging: wrinkles, firmness, skin density, uneven tone, uneven texture, lack of radiance and now age spots. With its cashmere texture, this cream melts into the skin, nourishes and softens it instantly. Used daily, it visibly reduces the appearance of wrinkles and age spots, improves irregularities in skin tone and texture, and restores firmness and elasticity to the skin. Divina cream infuses energy into the skin, making it more radiant and youthful, while improving its firmness and elasticity, smoothing its texture and providing a more luminous and toned tone. This unique anti-aging face cream is fortified with 4 expertly blended Immortelle extracts:Super Immortelle Extract: a natural alternative to synthetic retinol, equally effective on wrinkles but gentler on the skin. Supports skin architecture and helps increase skin density by stimulating collagen synthesis, resulting in skin renewal and a thicker epidermis. More effective than vitamin C on age-related hyperpigmentation, it reduces melanin production by 53%, for brighter, younger and more even skin.Immortelle oil extract: Rich in omegas 9 and 6, known for their nourishing properties, it keeps skin hydrated and healthy. Immortelle essential oil: A natural antioxidant, twice as powerful as vitamin E, to protect the skin from external aggressions such as air pollution.Immortelle aqueous extract: Rich in polyphenols, this powerful antioxidant helps counteract skin damage caused by external aggressions such as free radicals, pollution and UV rays.
product_name: Crema Divina Siempreviva 50ml - L'Occitane en Provence

product_description: Light and fresh as the water gushing from the Réotier spring, this thirst-quenching Hydrating Facial Mist combines the properties of calcium-rich water from the Réotier spring with those of hyaluronic acid to hydrate the skin.This beauty water is a real source of freshness to use at any time of the day to durably soothe the skin. It instantly hydrates and energizes the skin. Fresh and radiant, the skin looks revitalized.This invisible formula also helps set makeup during the day.For centuries, a natural spring of water has been flowing in the heart of the mountains of Provence to enrich itself with minerals and gush forth from the Réotier Spring. Thanks to its incredible richness in calcium, this exceptional water helps the skin preserve its barrier function and helps retain moisture. L'OCCITANE combines the powers of this Eau de Provence water with hyaluronic acid in a range of facial treatments for thirsty skin, for a radiant and healthy face.
product_name: Bruma Refrescante Hidratante Aqua Réotier 50ml - L'Occitane en Provence

product_description: A pre-moisturizing care with calcium-rich Réotier Spring water that provides a first layer of hydration to the skin and reinforces the moisturizing properties of your face care routine.Its texture as light as water and as smooth as a gel, provides a feeling of freshness and leaves the skin instantly juicy.100% satisfaction rateThe skin is immediately fresher: 89%The skin is awakened and looks revitalized: 100% The skin is immediately hydrated: 93% The product helps to have a natural complexion: 89% Self-assessment of 39 women over 28 daysFor centuries, a natural spring of water has been flowing in the heart of the mountains of Provence to enrich itself with minerals and gush forth from the Source de Réotier. Thanks to its incredible richness in calcium, this exceptional water helps the skin preserve its barrier function and helps retain moisture. L'OCCITANE combines the powers of this water from Provence with hyaluronic acid in a range of facial treatments for thirsty skin, for a radiant and healthy-looking complexion.Beauty tip: combine this Moisturizing Essence with Aqua Réotier Ultra Moisturizing Cream or Aqua Réotier Ultra Moisturizing Gel to reinforce its hydrating properties.1) Aqua Réotier Moisturizing Essence + Aqua Réotier Ultra Moisturizing Gel:After 1h: +133%After 4h: +67%After 8h: +55%2) Aqua Réotier Moisturizing Essence + Aqua Réotier Ultra Moisturizing Cream:After 1h: +109%After 4h: +78%After 8h: +52%By measurement of hydration rate on 13 women with a corneometry test.

product_description: For the first time, L'Occitane has gone all the way to China to reveal the beauty of a special ingredient: the Osmanthus. Surprising and unexpected, the Osmanthus flower blooms in autumn and exudes its aromas when most of the flowers of other species have already withered.We wanted to highlight this small yellow flower by composing a fresh floral trail with a velvety fruity touch, a scent that fills the air during its bloom.L'OCCITANE en Provence reveals its delicate and unique fragrance: green freshness, velvety apricot effect, creamy woody notes.450 Osmanthus flowers are needed to make one bottle of perfume (75 ml)!Contains a natural extract of Osmanthus flowers from Guilin, China.

Honey, almond and coconut extracts complement the nourishing action of shea butter to optimize the effectiveness of this care product. With a rich and creamy texture, it can be applied easily and quickly without leaving a greasy film.Use at any time of the day and as often as necessary:1. Massage a small amount into the palms of the hands with large circular movements. 2 minutes of gentle massage will allow the cream to penetrate the upper layers of the skin for immediate comfort.2. Take the time to make the cream penetrate, on the fingers and on the dry areas between the fingers.3. With the remaining cream, massage each finger, from the fingertips towards the hands.BURKINA FASO AND GHANA KARITENE BUTTEREnriched with omega 3, omega 6 and karitene, it helps nourish and protect dry and sensitive skin while soothing it immediately.Shea butter hand-produced by women from Burkina Faso and Ghana for L'OCCITANE. Year 2020
product_name: Crema de Manos Karité 75ml - L'Occitane en Provence

product_description: For the first time, L'Occitane has gone all the way to China to reveal the beauty of a special ingredient: the Osmanthus. Surprising and unexpected, the Osmanthus flower blooms in autumn and exudes its aromas when most of the flowers of other species have already withered.we wanted to highlight this small yellow flower by composing a fresh floral trail with a velvety fruity touch, a scent that fills the air during its bloom. This shower gel gently cleanses and envelops the skin with a delicate fragrance: green freshness, velvety apricot effect, creamy woody notes. Contains a natural extract of Osmanthus flowers from Guilin, China.

product_description: Enriched with powerful almond extracts, our Almond Milk Concentrate melts into the skin in a creamy and silky texture, to help skin look smoother. A new complex, associating walnut seed and almond extracts, makes skin seem smoothed and more beautiful. The almond nut, which grows protected in a beautifully soft and green velvet shell, is renowned for its ability to soften and smooth the skin. L'OCCITANE is committed to purchasing almonds from producers in the South of France so that the almond tree, which had long been forgotten in the region, once again becomes a familiar element in the Provençal landscape.
